name: tm09
effect: Teaches Bullet Seed to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
